name: In Front Of The Chapel
description:
You are on an open space before a small chapel.  A gravel road leads north
through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south.

exits.description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.
exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 3155 S #3155 Inside The Chapel~    You are in a small, dark chapel.  The dark brown glass in the tiny windows do not let much light through.  A few rows of worn wooden benches stand here and an ancient altar sits in the middle of the floor.

exits.description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.
exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 3154 E glass windows~ The windows must be meant to be dark.  At least they are completely clean.

extra_descriptions.description: The benches are not of the comfortable kind.
